status.serverDown: Server appears to be down. Please try again later.

category.title: Welcome to Access My Information HK
category.callout: Access my Info (AMI) is a web application that helps people to create justified requests for copies of their personal information from service providers. AMI is a step-by-step wizard that results in the generation of a personalized formal letter requesting access to the information a provider stores and utilizes about a person. The letter can be saved as a PDF, printed, and mailed through the post, or where available, directly emailed to a company’s privacy officer.
category.label: Category
category.instruction: This application will only take five minutes of your time!
category.info-1: Using Hong Kong commercial privacy legislation, XYZXX, Hong Kong residents can learn what information their telecommunications companies hold about them, for how long, for what purposes, and when they disclose that information. In effect, the law empowers Hong Kong people to understand how telecom companies manage the personal information entrusted to them and then make informed decisions about whether they want to maintain that commercial relationship. However, enforcing these rights can be challenging.
category.sponsorStatement: Access My Info is a joint initiative created by members of

operator.title: Select your service provider
operator.callout: Begin your request by selecting a company that provides your mobile phone and/or internet service.
operator.label: Companies

questions.title: What data do you want to access?
questions.callout: Get specific about the data you'd like access to. Ask questions about how your data is collected, used, shared, and stored.
questions.bank-desc: Federal government departments store personal data in “data banks”. Specifying specific data banks for {{operator}} to look through to find your personal data will improve the chances of a successful request. We have identified some data banks of interest, but please check the full list here and add any you see fit.
questions.otherBank: To add another data bank to your request, please consult the full list of {{operator}} data banks here.
questions.desc-bank: Describe the data bank you want

subject.title: Identifying information
subject.callout: Enter your information so {{company}} can identify you in their records. Remember, this form does not collect your information – it creates a letter for you to send yourself.
subject.label: Your Personal Information

request.title: Your Request
request.callout: Your letter to {{operator}} has been successfully generated by our system.
request.callout-hkid: Remember you must also take a photo of your HKID card or passport to send along with your letter as proof of your identity.

instructions.read-careful: Please read over the generated letter carefully!
instructions.post-instructions: Option 2: Use the button below to create a PDF of your letter. Then print it and mail it to:
instructions.email-instructions: Option 1: Use the button below to email your letter to:
instructions.email-unavailable: Option 1 Unavailable: No email listed for company privacy officer.
instructions.email-empty-prompt: If the email is empty or the button didn't work...
instructions.email-empty-instructions: Copy the text below and email it to the address above

request.emailProblem: Problem? Simply copy & paste the below text into your email client and send to {{email}}
request.continue: Continue on to maximize your impact

finish.title: Thank you for submitting your request!
finish.share-prompt: Share this campaign with your friends:
finish.label-data: I would like to share the following data with AMI researchers:
finish.text-data: Request made to {{operator}} for the {{servicelist}} in {{jurisdiction}} on {{date}}.
finish.label-subscribe: I would like to subscribe to receive email updates to support me throughout the request process.
finish.text-subscribe: This may involve an email sent after several days to check if you've received a response from {{operator}}, that includes instructions on what to do if you haven't. You'll also get an invitation to fill out a short questionnaire. We won't share your email with any third parties, other than the email service we use to send the emails themselves.

modal.title: Share your feedback
modal.desc: Please share your thoughts on using Access My Info.

questions.easyToUse: Access My Info is easy to use.
questions.quickToLearn: I learned to use it quickly.
questions.fewSteps: It requires the fewest steps possible to accomplish what I want to do with it.
questions.noInstructions: I can use it without written instructions.
questions.mistakeRecover: I can recover from mistakes quickly and easily.
questions.success: I can use it successfully every time.
questions.recommend: I would recommend it to a friend.
questions.like: What did you like about Access My Info?
questions.challenge: What challenges did you face while using Access My Info?
questions.industry: What industries or government departments would you like to see AMI support next?
questions.general: Do you have any other comments?

offline.sorry: Sorry about this, but Access My Info is currently offline!
offline.soon: Rest assured, we're working hard to bring it back up as soon as possible.
